title.narrative: Citizen-Centric Judicial Modernization and Justice Service Delivery

description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve the efficiency and transparency of, and access to, selected citizen-centric justice services.

condition.narrative: Schedule 2, Section I. A.4. The Recipient shall, within one (1) month as of the Effective Date:(a) Update the Project OperationsManual to reflect the Additional Activities under the Project, adjust the results framework accordingly, in a manner and substancesatisfactory to the Association; and (b) hire, and thereafter maintain throughout the period of Project implementation, anenvironmental and social expert/consultant for the Judiciary Delivery Unit with qualification and experience and under terms ofreference acceptable to the Association, to strengthen the Recipient's implementation capacities on health and safety issues andthe respective mitigation measures in the execution of civil works.

The Recipient shall, within one (1) month as of the Effective Date hire, and thereafter maintain throughout the period of Projectimplementation, an environmental and social expert/consultant for the Judiciary Delivery Unit with qualification and experience andunder terms of reference acceptable to the Association, to strengthen the Recipient's implementation capacities

The Recipient shall, within one (1) month as of the Effective Date update the Project Operations Manual to reflect the AdditionalActivities under the Project, adjust the results framework accordingly, in a manner and substance satisfactory to the Association.
